casebody.data:
Frederick L. Regnery, Appellant, v. Chris-Craft Boat Sales, Inc. and John P. Rodi, Appellees.Gen. No. 40,996.

(Abstract of Decision.)

Heard in second division, first district, this court at October term, 1939;opinion filed May 28, 1940.John H. S. Lee, for appellant; Cameron F. Woods, of counsel; Bippus, Rose., Burt & Pierce, for appellees; Lester K. Olin, of counsel. Opinion by Justice Friend.

‘‘Not to be published in full.”
